title: Strong Women
description: A gripping, gritty thriller by a woman who truly knows how to get under the skin of the London underworld  Jo Strong is the youngest widow in the East End. Running her late husband’s jewelry shop and mercilessly bullied by her evil mother-in-law, she is trying to get her life back together again. But when the 14-year-old daughter of one of the East end’s most notorious gangsters is kidnapped, Jo finds herself in a deadly race against time to rescue the girl—before it is too late. To get her back, she’ll have to join forces with damaged but handsome bad boy Gabe Miller, a man who has a dark past of his own.
author: Roberta Kray
